Constructor Detail

PeerList

public PeerList()
Looks for peers.txt in current dir. Will create it, using default peers text file, if not found. This is implemented for running Peer2Peer a jar file where the default peers text file is read in as a inputstream from the jar file.

Method Detail

openFile

public boolean openFile(int rw)
Opens file for reading or writing.

Parameters:
rw - 0 = read, 1 = write
Returns:
true for success

arraylist containing values from file
